name: Paddling The Kayak
description: Reach out with the tip of the blade to touch the water about two feet away, directly on the side of your boat.Your paddle shaft should be angled steeply.

name: Wanderlust Outdoor Camping
description: Camping is an outdoor activity involving overnight stays away from home with or without a shelter, such as a tent or a recreational vehicle tour for comfort.

name: Hiking On Sunrise Mountain
description: High humidity, long days, and ever-increasing record high temperatures might make hiking before sunrise the best option.This is true for comfort.

name: Bike Ride In Banff National Park
description: Banff is home to some of the most spectacular road and mountain biking in the world. Cycling is accessible to everyone in Banff.Trails range from easy.

name: Jumping In Sunset

name: Powder Skiing
description: Powder skiing is all about control through resistance (flexing and extending), rather than turning. ... Many new powder skiers also tend to sit back.
